Trigger.name: combatstats.getdamage
Trigger.script:
if not damage then damage = 0 end if not hits then hits = 0 end if not misses then misses = 0 end if not attacks then attacks = 0 end
if tonumber(matches[2]) == 0 then misses = misses + 1 attacks = attacks + 1 if avdammute == false then cecho("<dodger_blue>Miss recorded") end return end
damage = damage + matches[2] hits = hits + 1 attacks = attacks + 1 if avdammute == false then cecho("<dodger_blue>Damage captured") end

Alias.name: combatstats clear
Alias.script: damage = 0 hits = 0 misses = 0 attacks = 0 cecho("<dodger_blue>Avdam cleared")

Alias.name: combatstats help
Alias.script:
cecho("
<dodger_blue>Combatstats, A simple tool to help calculate average damage and accuracy of a fight.
") cecho("
<dodger_blue>combatstats help - Display this helpfile.") cecho("
<dodger_blue>combatstats clear - Clear collected data.") cecho("
<dodger_blue>combatstats print - Print collected data") cecho("
<dodger_blue>combatstats mute - Mute the 'damage grabbed' and 'hit recorded' messages.")

Alias.name: combatstats print
Alias.script:
avdam = damage/hits accuracy = misses/attacks * 100
cecho("
<dodger_blue>Average damage: " .. damage .. "/" .. hits .. "="..avdam .. "
") cecho("<dodger_blue>Total Accuracy: " .. misses .. "/" .. attacks .. "=".. string.format("<dodger_blue> %.2f", accuracy) .."%
")

Alias.name: combatstats mute
Alias.script: if not avdammute then avdammute = false end if avdammute == false then avdammute = true cecho("\n<dodger_blue>Avdam muted.") elseif avdammute == true then avdammute = false cecho("\n<dodger_blue>Avdam unmuted.") end

Script.name: combatstats.startup
Script.script:
function combatstatsstartup() cecho("\n<dodger_blue>combatstatscalc loaded. 'combatstats help' for more info") end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysLoadEvent", "combatstatsstartup")
